headline: Nucor Announces 210th Consecutive Cash Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) declared the regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.55 per share on Nucor's common stock. This cash dividend is payable on November 10, 2025 to stockholders of record on September 30, 2025 and is Nucor's 210th consecutive quarterly cash dividend.
